snippet: Metropolitan Diary: When a car full of preoccupied passengers didn’t move through a red light, the driver behind them, who didn’t have a horn, reminded them in person.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: When a car full of preoccupied passengers didn’t move through a red light, the driver behind them, who didn’t have a horn, reminded them in person.

headline.main: A Polite Bit of Road Rage
